CustomField.description: Formula to calculate number of months to conversion.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Created_Rating__c, "Lead 2"), IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<Lead_2_Date__c, -1, ((YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - YEAR(Lead_2_Date__c))*12) + (MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - MONTH(Lead_2_Date__c))), IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<Released_to_Cadence__c, -1, ((YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - YEAR(Released_to_Cadence__c))*12) + (MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - MONTH(Released_to_Cadence__c))) )
CustomField.label: Conv_OPP
